thread.title: Kardashians post heartbreaking messages for Lamar Odom
thread.title_full: Kardashians post heartbreaking messages for Lamar Odom

title: Kardashians post heartbreaking messages for Lamar Odom
text:
Kardashians post heartbreaking messages for Lamar Odom Erin Jensen, USA TODAY 11:52 a.m. EDT October 15, 2015 Lamar Odom with (L to R) Kendall Jenner, Kim Kardashian, Kylie Jenner, Khloe Kardashian and Kourtney Kardashian at the 'Teen Choice Awards' in 2010. (Photo: Chris Pizzello, AP) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Kendall Jenner isn't the only member of the Kardashian/Jenner family to take to social media in support of Lamar Odom, who remains in the hospital . 
Rob Kardashian broke his three-week Instagram silence to post this emotional message for Lamar on Wednesday. 
He wrote: 
Praying nonstop for my Brother !! 
Episodes of Keeping Up with the Kardashians and Khloe & Lamar showed that Rob and Lamar had a very close relationship when Rob lived with his sister, Khloe Kardashian, and the former NBA star. 
Mama Kris Jenner also took to Instagram and asked fans for their support. She captioned a pic of a happy Lamar on the basketball court in his L.A. Lakers uniform: 
Please pray for Lamar #ourfighter 
She also included a prayer hands emoji in her post.
